The graph of $ y = 2x^2 + 4x + 3$ has its:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\  \text{lowest point at } {(-1,9)}\qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ \text{lowest point at } {(1,1)}\qquad \\
\textbf{(C)}\ \text{lowest point at } {(-1,1)}\qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ \text{highest point at } {(-1,9)}\qquad \\
\textbf{(E)}\ \text{highest point at } {(-1,1)}$
